post_content:
Free s/h.  Payment:  Paypal gift preferred; Paypal goods please add 3%.  Check/MO fine. 


***** PLEASE ***** Correspondence ONLY to – [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

In other words – NO PMs –  you can comment in thread, but must email to follow up.

I have ~125 Howe commons on ebay right now.

[url]https://www.ebay.com/sch/sg713/m.html?_dkr=1&iconV2Request=true&_blrs=recall_filtering&_ssn=sg713&_oac=1[/url]

If the link does not work -- look up by my ebay id – sg713, or search “T206 Howe”

Howe Commons (without bids *) – 40 each

* If card has bid(s), I do have some dupes that might work.

*** Always open for trades. Especially for any lower grade Hindu that I don't have. *** 

Thanks, Scott
Isn’t there another member who collects Howe stamped t206? I think his username is like Howe’s Hunter? I swear I saw a post of his this week. Sure he’ll have a field day with this one.
Could anyone share the history on these cards or the collector that stamped them?

^^^^^^^^ Still some sharp commons on ebay ^^^^^^^

__________________________________________________________________

Well, for whatever reason, the bottom has fallen out of the Hindu market .... :(

Haven't seen prices like these in quite awhile ...... time to buy .... HAHA -- I sound like a "used car(d) salesman" ............... :p

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Howe Commons on ebay reduced ^^^^^^^^^^


Now:

35 each


Please note:

1 -- There a quite a few dupes (only 5 Casey's :p).  If a card of interest is a dupe, please indicate preferred card by using "ebay Item Number."
